title: Living Room Sublet in UWS - 775 Columbus Ave
posting_body: ['Columbus Square: LUXURY APARTMENTS ON THE UPPER WEST SIDE with roof deck with BBQ area, private gym, lounge, bike storage, and in-unit laundry.', 'Hi, I am looking for someone to take over my lease from August 1st, 2022, to July 17th, 2023.', 'The apartment is located at 775 Columbus Ave, close to 96st Metro station and 15 min by walking to Columbia University.', 'Apartment Details:', '· Rent is $2200/month for the living room (1 bathroom + 1 bedroom, 676sq.', 'ft.)', '· The roommate is an incoming student for Columbia University Fall 2022', '· 15 min walk to Columbia University', '· Utilities include gas and trash, varied by months', '· In-unit laundry', '· Designer kitchen with quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, Dishwasher, Gas Stove, and Micro-oven.', '· Central HEAT and AC.', '· 24 hours Live-in Super', 'Please feel free to contact me if you are interested or if you have questions.', '775 Columbus Avenue,', 'Upper West Side,', 'Manhattan, NY 10025']
